Evaluates the expression based on a string containing variable assignments.
evaluate(Map<String, Integer>) - Method in class mathexp.Add
Evaluates the addition expression by evaluating both the left and right expressions, then adding their results.
evaluate(Map<String, Integer>) - Method in class mathexp.Div
Evaluates the division expression by evaluating both the left (numerator) and right (denominator) expressions, then dividing their results.

evaluate(Map<String, Integer>) - Method in class mathexp.Mul

Evaluates the number, which simply returns its value.
evaluate(Map<String, Integer>) - Method in class mathexp.Sub
Evaluates the subtraction expression by evaluating both the left and right expressions, then subtracting the right value from the left value.
evaluate(Map<String, Integer>) - Method in class mathexp.Variable
Evaluates the variable by looking up its value in the provided map.
